answers.answer: I'm due Dec 20 I nvr had a cycle idk y it may had been off since I had a miscarriage in Feb. But Dr say it should hve been march 15/16 and I conceived march 29

question: Hi..new to the site was hoping someone with a due date around the same as mine could help (Dec 31st due date)  I'm confused as to when my LMP was..thinking end of March.  Anyone with a similar due date..does this sound correct?  Wondering because baby is measuring a bit large and I fear Gestational diabetes again.  Thanks
title: Due date LMP question anyone?
